plot: Count Dracula has made it to England - a new world pulsing with fresh blood - and lays his plans to spread his foul vampire contagion, but why does he set his sights on the seemingly ordinary Lucy Westenra?

Count Dracula arrives in present-day England. He marvels at technological progress but also has to face a special team, headed by Zoe Helsing, a descendant (once removed) and heir of vampire-hating Sister Agatha. Revived when a diver disturbs his coffin, he learns fast, remaining as bloodthirsty and merciless as ever, against a bright new world he hopes to conquer by relative surprise, focusing on the fearlessly infatuated Lucy Westenra.—KGF Vissers
